text:
Comedian Kiku Sharda, released on bail after being arrested twice for mimicking Dera Sacha Sauda head Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh, says the whole experience was “traumatic” and “sad.”

Known for his drag act as Palak in TV show “Comedy Nights With Kapil,” Kiku, 40, was first arrested from Mumbai on Wednesday by Haryana Police after Dera followers registered a case against him in Fatehabad and Kaithal districts on December 31 under Section 295 A (hurting religious sentiments). After getting bail, he was again arrested on the outskirts of Kaithal by Haryana Police. — PTI
title: Experience traumatic, says Kiku
